languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, вы уж извините дурней моих. Я и сам опешил: шутка ли — Вольный Торговец во плоти! А насчет этого..." {n}Рябой хмуро оглядывается на стойку.{/n} "Из уважения отпираться не буду — вы нас на горячем взяли".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, вы уж извините дурней моих. Я и сам опешил: шутка ли — Вольный Торговец во плоти! А насчет этого..." {n}Рябой хмуро оглядывается на ящик.{/n} "Из уважения отпираться не буду — вы нас на горячем взяли".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, вы уж извините дурней моих. Я и сам опешил: шутка ли — Вольный Торговец во плоти! А насчет этого..." {n}Рябой хмуро оглядывается на стойку.{/n} "Из уважения отпираться не буду — вы нас на горячем взяли".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the crate.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the crate.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debéis perdonar a estos cenutrios. Yo mismo me he llevado una sorpresa; uno no ve todos los días en persona {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. En cuanto a esto...». {n}El hombre lanza una mirada sombría a la panoplia.{/n} «No le insultaré con un pretexto: nos ha pillado con las manos en la masa».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debéis perdonar a estos cenutrios. Yo mismo me he llevado una sorpresa; uno no ve todos los días en persona {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. En cuanto a esto...». {n}El hombre lanza una mirada sombría a la panoplia.{/n} «No le insultaré con un pretexto: nos ha pillado con las manos en la masa».

languages.text: 「陛下、あいつらを許してやってくださいな。私も驚きました。自由開拓者を生で見ることは滅多にありませんから。そして、これについては…」{n}男はラックに険しい視線を投げかけた。{/n}「否定しても侮辱はしません。あなたは私たちを現行犯逮捕したのですから」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あいつらを許してやってくださいな。私も驚きました。自由開拓者を生で見ることは滅多にありませんから。そして、これについては…」{n}男はラックに険しい視線を投げかけた。{/n}「否定しても侮辱はしません。あなたは私たちを現行犯逮捕したのですから」

languages.text: “大人，您千万别和这群白痴一般计较。说真的，就连我自己都吓了一跳，毕竟像行商浪人这样的大人物，可不是每天都能见到。至于这边……”{n}眼前的男人打量了一眼武器架，目光冷峻。{/n}“我无意侮辱您，也无意抵赖——没错，您把我们抓了个正着。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

traits.locale_text: “大人，您千万别和这群白痴一般计较。说真的，就连我自己都吓了一跳，毕竟像行商浪人这样的大人物，可不是每天都能见到。至于这边……”{n}眼前的男人打量了一眼武器架，目光冷峻。{/n}“我无意侮辱您，也无意抵赖——没错，您把我们抓了个正着。”

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Ihr müsst diese Dummköpfe entschuldigen. Ich war selbst überrascht ... immerhin sieht man {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht jeden Tag. Und was das hier angeht ..." {n}Der Mann wirft einen finsteren Blick auf das Regal.{/n} "Ich will Euch nicht beleidigen, indem ich es abstreite ... Ihr habt uns auf frischer Tat ertappt."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Ihr müsst diese Dummköpfe entschuldigen. Ich war selbst überrascht ... immerhin sieht man {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht jeden Tag. Und was das hier angeht ..." {n}Der Mann wirft einen finsteren Blick auf das Regal.{/n} "Ich will Euch nicht beleidigen, indem ich es abstreite ... Ihr habt uns auf frischer Tat ertappt."

languages.text: « Faut excuser cette bande d'abrutis, Votre Seigneurie. Moi le premier, je m'attendais à tout sauf à croiser {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en chair et en os. Quant à ça... » {n}L'homme jette un regard sombre au râtelier d'armes.{/n} « J'insulterai pas votre intelligence en niant l'évidence... vous nous avez pris la main dans le sac. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."

traits.locale_text: « Faut excuser cette bande d'abrutis, Votre Seigneurie. Moi le premier, je m'attendais à tout sauf à croiser {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en chair et en os. Quant à ça... » {n}L'homme jette un regard sombre au râtelier d'armes.{/n} « J'insulterai pas votre intelligence en niant l'évidence... vous nous avez pris la main dans le sac. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu mankafaları mazur görün. Ben de afalladım. Sonuçta insan her gün karşısında kanlı canlı Hür Tacir görmüyor. Bundandır ki..." {n}Adam, rafa ümitsizce bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İnkâr ederek sizi aşağılamayacağım. Bizi suçüstü yakaladınız."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you must excuse these blockheads. I was taken aback myself — it's not every day you see the Rogue Trader in the flesh. And as for this..." {n}The man casts a grim glance at the rack.{/n} "I won't insult you by denying it — you've caught us red-handed."
